title: Client windows are blacked out patch 5.14
body: Ever since the 5.14 patch, my League Client windows are blacked out. I can click on all but the Bilgewater rewards and it's rather irritating! Any thoughts on how to fix this?

replies.body: Hey -- sorry to see the client was bugging out like that.  Are you still experiencing this issue?  Since you posted, we've worked with the appropriate teams to make some changes to how the client landing page loads Bilgewater content...  so would be great to know if you're still having this problem.  Thanks!
im still having the same problem

> [{quoted}](name=GnomerPile,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=khRYN8TQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-01T18:38:40.041+0000)
>
> im still having the same problem

Hey GnomerPile.  In another thread, you posted that League was crashing every time you logged in.  Are you able to login _sometimes _ (which would be when you see the blanked-out areas of the client landing page)?   Or am I misunderstanding what's happening to you?
Dunno what about GnomerPile, but I can't login because the whole login window is black and only music plays.
im having the same problem as vistha kai
Actually my problem went off with the new patch.
Thanks for the update, Vistha Kai.  Is anyone else in this thread still experiencing issues after the patch?
